title: #BitcoinVegan
author: #BitcoinVegan
content: I'm currently following a tutorial from freedom node to run a full bitcoin node but every time i get to the commandmake -j1 Everything on my screen freezes. I'm using this link:https://freedomnode.com/blog/51/how-to-set-up-full-bitcoin-node-on-raspberry-pi-3-with-ease#commentsCan someone help
